channel.description: Recent content in Devops on Mart's blog

item.title: Migrating Classic Azure DevOps Releases to YAML Pipelines
item.description: Migrate your classic releases to YAML pipelines in Azure DevOps with our comprehensive guide. Streamline your deployment process today!

item.title: Golden Tips To Leave Companies Without A Nasty Smell
item.description: Leave no technical debt, clean up after yourself when leaving a company. The first impression is just as important as the last impression.
